mcq.statement: What is the correct indirect speech for the sentence: He said, If I work hard, I will pass the exam.

options.a: He said that if he works hard, he would pass the exam
options.b: He said that if he worked hard, he would pass the exam.
options.c: He said that if I worked hard, I would pass the exam.
options.d: He said that if I work hard, I will pass the exam.
